Text: Hotel Discount Notice for PHILLIPIMAGE IMAGE Dear PHILLIP Congratulations You get Hotel Discounts plus Gas Click here now to get your Hotel Discounts plus your Gas Your Gas is a Special Reward to thank you for being a valued member and the best way we know how to introduce you to all the moneysaving benefits you can get with our new Travel Values Plus program Travel Values Plus is our premier online travel savings program weve created to help you save money You can slash the price of your hotel room by every time you travel Plus theres much more Click here now IMAGE So get your Gas plus Hotel Discounts from Travel Values Plus Its easy Just click here now Thanks again and were sure youll save money with the new Travel Values Plus program Sincerely IMAGE Marty Isaac Vice President Travel Values Plus PS Get your Gas and moneysaving Travel Values Plus discounts with our compliments Click here now Only available to residents of the US Puerto Rico and the US Virgin Islands Travel Values Plus is owned and operated by webloyaltycom All trademarks and or copyrights are the property of their respective owners and unless otherwise noted Travel Values Plus is not affiliated with the respective owners Gas benefit not available for gasoline purchases made in New Jersey Travel Values Plus IMAGE This message was not sent unsolicited You are currently subscribed to the OpenWin mailing list If you wish to unsubscribe from our mailing list Click here
